title: "type annotations required" errors in 1.28 beta

labels.name: T-libs-api
labels.description: Relevant to the library API team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-beta
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to beta.

body:
A bunch of crates failed to compile in 1.28 beta with error messages like these:

```
type annotations required: cannot resolve `std::io::Error: std::convert::From<_>`
type annotations required: cannot resolve `std::borrow::Cow<'_, str>: std::convert::From<&_>`'`
type annotations required: cannot resolve `std::string::String: std::convert::AsRef<_>`
```

* [x] [mles-client](https://crates.io/crates/mles-client) regressed from stable to beta ([build log](https://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.28-1/beta-2018-06-22/reg/mles-client-1.0.6/log.txt)) cc @jq-rs
* [ ] [ogrep](https://crates.io/crates/ogrep) regressed from stable to beta ([build log](https://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.28-1/beta-2018-06-22/reg/ogrep-0.2.1/log.txt)) cc @kriomant
* [x] [openml](https://crates.io/crates/openml) regressed from stable to beta ([build log](https://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.28-1/beta-2018-06-22/reg/openml-0.1.1/log.txt)) cc @mbillingr
* [ ] [screeps-api](https://crates.io/crates/screeps-api) regressed from stable to beta ([build log](https://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.28-1/beta-2018-06-22/reg/screeps-api-0.4.1/log.txt)) cc @daboross
* [x] [tokio-dns-unofficial](https://crates.io/crates/tokio-dns-unofficial) regressed from stable to beta ([build log](https://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.28-1/beta-2018-06-22/reg/tokio-dns-unofficial-0.1.1/log.txt)) cc @sbstp
* [x] [topgrade](https://crates.io/crates/topgrade) regressed from stable to beta ([build log](https://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.28-1/beta-2018-06-22/reg/topgrade-0.5.0/log.txt)) cc @r-darwish
* [ ] [travis](https://crates.io/crates/travis) regressed from stable to beta ([build log](https://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.28-1/beta-2018-06-22/reg/travis-0.1.1/log.txt)) cc @softprops

~~Also, the following crates are failing because they depend on `tokio-dns-unofficial`:~~

* ~~[tokio-postgres](https://crates.io/crates/tokio-postgres) regressed from stable to beta ([build log](https://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.28-1/beta-2018-06-22/reg/tokio-postgres-0.3.0/log.txt))~~
* ~~[tokio-tungstenite](https://crates.io/crates/tokio-tungstenite) regressed from stable to beta ([build log](https://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.28-1/beta-2018-06-22/reg/tokio-tungstenite-0.5.1/log.txt))~~
* ~~GitHub repo [grotsev/http_port](https://github.com/grotsev/http_port) regressed from stable to beta ([build log](http://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.28-1/beta-2018-06-22/gh/grotsev.http_port/log.txt))~~
